qnaJson.content: I have been in the mortgage business now for nearly 20 years. After leaving the United States Marine Corps in 2001, assisting people with the American Dream of home ownership has been a top priority. I know exactly what it takes to get the job done and I have the experience to back it up. Truly believe in the American Dream and have set a blazing path to make sure every customer within arms reach can own a piece of the pie! Since 2001 the mortgage business has been a passion and an opportunity to meet new people with extraordinary goals. Helping them achieve those goals is what I do best!
